entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: UPDF - PDF Editor with AI
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • UPDF AI UnlimitedÔºö$79.00 ‚Üí $29.00 [$29.00 ~ $79.00]

Application Description

UPDF is an all-in-one AI-integrated PDF editor toolkit you can use to summarize, translate, read, edit, annotate, organize, convert, OCR, crop, watermark, flatten, secure, share, or print PDF files, convert PDFs to mind maps, and chat with images. Get all the tools you need to manage PDFs in one premier, all-rounder smart app for your Mac. One UPDF license allows you to use it across all platforms, both desktop and mobile. Key features: AI Assistant - AI chat with your PDF to summarize, translate, explain, and rephrase lengthy PDFs in minutes. - Convert PDFs to mind maps. - Upload images and ask any questions about the images. - Ask any prompts and get answers from AI. Edit PDFs - Add/edit the text, images, and links in PDF. - Change the color, font style, size, orientation, and other parameters of the text. - Add, crop, resize, extract, replace, rotate, or remove the images. - Add, edit, or remove watermarks from PDFs. - Set color, image, or document as a background for PDFs. - Add, edit, or remove header and footer from PDFs. Annotate PDFs - Highlight, underline, strikethrough, or squiggly the text in PDFs. - Add sticky notes, text boxes, text comments, text callouts to PDFs. - Add shapes (rectangles, ovals, lines, arrows, hexagons, triangles) to PDFs. - Use the pencil and eraser tools for free-hand drawing within a PDF. - Add stamps and stickers to PDFs. - Add signatures to PDFs. - Manage the annotation list. Compare PDF - Find differences between two similar files. UPDF Cloud - Seamlessly access your files across different devices and sync your files across all platforms in real time. OCR (exclusively available in the program that you download from our website) - Convert scanned PDFs or images into searchable and editable PDFs or vice versa. - Can recognize 38 languages as per choice. Convert PDFs - Convert PDFs to all major Office formats: DOCX, XLSX, and PPTX. - Convert PDFs to major image formats: PNG, JPEG, BMP, TIFF, and GIF. - Convert PDFs to other file formats such as TXT, RTF, CSV, HTML, and XML. - "Text Recognition (OCR)" feature included converting scanned PDFs to editable formats. Organize PDF Pages - Insert, replace, extract, split, rotate, remove, and reorder the pages in PDFs - Crop PDF pages. Protect PDFs - Add an open password to protect PDFs from being opened without authorization. - Add a permission password to protect PDFs from copying, editing, and printing. - Offers 3 different encryption levels: 128-bit RC4, 128-bit AES, and 256-bit AES. - Remove the PDF password from your document. Read and Print PDFs - View PDF in multiple modes: Single Page View/Scrolling, Two Page View/Scrolling. - Text to speech. - Search and find text. - Open and view multiple PDFs in tabs. - Slideshow PDF. - Support switching to dark mode. - Add and manage bookmarks in PDF. - Print PDFs. Create PDFs - Create blank PDF or from Word/Excel/PPT/image. Fill & Sign - Create fillable PDF forms. - Fill and sign PDF with keyboard, mouse, trackpad, or from images, save to the cloud and use across platforms. - Digital signatures. PDF/A Conversion Supported - Save your PDF files in PDF/A format to archive data. Flatten PDFs - Save your PDF files as flattened into a single-layer PDF. Batch Process PDFs - Batch combine, convert, encrypt, create bulk of PDFs or Insert PDF file into multiple PDFs with a click Pro Features of In-App Purchase - Use UPDF across all platforms including desktops and mobiles. - Save the new edits without the UPDF watermark. - Batch Convert unlimited PDF files ( Batch Convert up to 5 documents in the trial version). - Free Users will get 1 GB of Cloud Storage; Paid UPDF users get 10 GB and AI users get 100 GB. Need help? If you have any questions about this app, please email us at support@superace.com. You can follow us on Facebook: @superacesoftware Twitter: @updfeditor Youtube: @updf1337 Instagram: @updfeditor If you feel this app is helpful, please rate us on the App Store. Thank you!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Vythm VJ - Music Visualizer DJ
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Vythm PROÔºö$9.99 ‚Üí $3.49 [$3.49 ~ $9.99]

Application Description

--- Experience Your Music with Vythm --- Unlock the potential of music visualization with Vythm! Vythm is a versatile music visualization app that allows you to create visual artworks in harmony with your selected music. It includes a variety of unique visualization modes, including Equalizer, Mandala, Shapes, Fluids, Psychedelic, Dreaming, and more. Choose a background and apply image effects to personalize your visualization completely. --- Your Vision, Your Visualization --- Vythm provides you with numerous options to realize your creative vision: - Over 100 carefully selected backgrounds. - MIDI input for precise visual control. - NDI streaming support for sharing your creations. - Real-time image effects like color correction, bloom, chromatic aberration, and more. - Size, rotation, and orientation adjustments. And much more! The Equalizer, Rhythm, and Peer modes are available for free, while other modes can be unlocked through a subscription. --- Input Formats --- Select your music from a variety of sources: - Import any mp3 or m4a files. - Access your iTunes library (Please note that Apple Music is not currently supported). - Utilize your device's microphone, with sensitivity adjustments for various use cases. - Enjoy three preselected songs for quick inspiration. --- Record Your Masterpiece --- Vythm offers a recording feature that enables you to share or save your creations. Revisit your immersive visual world at your convenience or dazzle your audience with your artistic masterpiece. --- Share Your Thoughts --- Our top priority is to provide you with the best possible experience. If you encounter issues or have ideas for new features, please do not hesitate to contact us at info@mkgames.org. If you enjoy the app, we would greatly appreciate your feedback and a review! Thank you for choosing Vythm! Download and experience Vythm (Music Visualization 2024 / Audio Visualizer) today! Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Any FLAC Converter
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$9.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $9.99]Ôºâ

Application Description

Any FLAC Converter is the best and easy-to-use FLAC audio Converter. It works as a special FLAC to MP3 Converting software to change FLAC file to MP3 for media or MP3 Players. It can convert any FLAC music to AAC/WAV/ALAC/OGG/WMA/AIFF, etc. for iOS devices like iPhone, iPad and iPod. It can also convert FLAC to iTunes for your free songs enjoyment. This powerful FLAC file Converter can extract and convert any Video/Audio documents to FLAC format, including convert MP3 to FLAC, WAV to FLAC, MP4 to FLAC, FLV to FLAC, Apple Lossless to FLAC and so on. Key Features: 1. Convert any FLAC file to other audio/sound formats like MP3 As the professional FLAC (Free Lossless Audio Codec) conversion tool, it can convert any FLAC audio to MP3, WAV, Apple Lossless (ALAC), iTunes, AIFF, AC3, AU, M4A, MP3, OGG, RA, and WMA. 2. Extract and convert any Video/Music Files like MP4 to FLAC Besides converting .flac to .mp3, .wav, .wma, .m4r, etc. directly, you can also convert any video file like MP4, AVI, MOV, FLV, MKV, WMV, etc. and audio like MP3, AAC, M4A, WAV, AIFF, WAV, ALAC, OGG, etc. including recorded movie and sounds to .flac contrarily. 3. Enjoy the converted FLAC files on iTunes, iPad, iPhone and other portable devices or media players This FLAC Converter can easily translate FLAC files to iTunes supported audio formats easily. It can also convert FLAC to iPad Pro/Air/mini, iPhone 7/7 plus/SE/6s/6s plus/6/6 plus/5s/5, iPod touch/nano/shuffle, supported audio formats and also many other mp3 players for enjoyment. 4. Free edit Output Audio Files Free trim any length of the audio file to convert. Adjust audio bitrates, audio channels, sample rate, volume of the output audio files for better effects. 5. Lossless audio quality and super fast conversion speed With this FLAC Converter, converting FLAC to MP3/WAV/ALAC and other audio formats will never be a problem for you. And you don‚Äôt need to worry about the converted audio quality and the lightning converting speed. If you have any question about Any FLAC Converter, please contact us via macsupport@tipard.com

Application Screenshot

iPhone

7Ôºâ„ÄÅÂíåÂπ≥Á≤æËã±ÂÖ®ÁêÉÊúç„ÄÅÂ†°Âûí‰πãÂ§ú„ÄÅfgo„ÄÅÂΩ±‰πãËØó„ÄÅÂ§±ËêΩÈæôÁ∫¶ÈªëËâ≤Ê≤ôÊº†„ÄÅÊñáÊòéÈáçÂêØÂÖ®ÁêÉÊúç„ÄÅËçíÈáé‰π±Êñó„ÄÅÁãÇÈáéÈ£ôËΩ¶9Á≠âÊ∏∏ÊàèÂä†ÈÄüÔºÅÊ∏∏ÊàèÂ∫ìÂåÖÁΩóÂçÉÊ¨æÂ•ΩÁé©Ê∏∏ÊàèÔºåÁÉ≠Ê∏∏Êñ∞Ê∏∏ÊéíË°å‰∏ÄÁõÆ‰∫ÜÁÑ∂„ÄÇÂπ≥ÂùáÊØèÂ§©3Ê¨æÊ∏∏ÊàèÁöÑÈÄüÂ∫¶‰∏äÊñ∞„ÄÇAppÂÜÖÂèØ‰ª•ÈöèÊó∂Êèê‰∫§ÊÉ≥Áé©ÁöÑÊ∏∏ÊàèÔºå‰Ω†ÊÉ≥Áé©ÁöÑÊàë‰ª¨ÈÉΩÊîØÊåÅÔºÅ „Äê Â•áÊ∏∏ÁîµÁ´ûÁ∫ßÂä†ÈÄü „Äë Â•áÊ∏∏ÂÖ®Ëá™Á†î‚ÄúQiy‚ÄùÁîµÁ´ûÁ∫ßÂä†ÈÄüÂºïÊìéÈúáÊíº‰∏äÁ∫øÔºåÂä†ÈÄüÁ®≥ÂÆöÊÄßÊõ¥ËÉú‰∏ÄÁ≠πÔºå‰∏çÊÉßÁßªÂä®ÁΩëÁªúÁöÑÊ≥¢Âä®„ÄÇÂü∫‰∫éÂ•áÊ∏∏ÁîµÁ´ûÁ∫ßÊ∏∏ÊàèÁΩëÁªúÔºåÂ∏¶‰Ω†ÊÑüÂèóÁ®≥ÂÆöÊµÅÁïÖÁöÑÊ∏∏Êàè‰ΩìÈ™å„ÄÇ‰ΩéÂª∂Ëøü„ÄÅ‰∏çÊéâÁ∫øÔºåWIFI/5GÈöèÂøÉÂàáÊç¢„ÄÇ „ÄêÊñ∞Ê∏∏Êé®Ëçê Á°¨Ê†∏ÊîªÁï• „Äë Êñ∞Â¢ûÊ∏∏ÊàèÊ∏ÖÂçï„ÄÅÊñ∞Ê∏∏È¢Ñ‰∏äÁ∫øÊó∂Èó¥Ë°®Á≠âÂäüËÉΩÔºåÊõ¥Â§öÂÆûÁî®„ÄÅfunnyÁöÑÊ∏∏Êàè‰∏ªÈ¢òÁ≠â‰Ω†Êé¢Á¥¢„ÄÇÊ∏∏Êàè‰ªãÁªç„ÄÅÊñ∞Ê∏∏Êé®Ëçê„ÄÅÁ°¨Ê†∏ÊîªÁï•Ôºå‰∏∞ÂØåÁöÑÊ∏∏ÊàèÊ∑±Â∫¶ÂÜÖÂÆπÂ∏¶‰Ω†ÊâìÂºÄÊñ∞‰∏ñÁïåÁöÑÂ§ßÈó®ÔºÅ 1„ÄÅËÆ¢ÈòÖÂë®ÊúüÂèäÂ•óÈ§êÂêçÁß∞Ôºö1‰∏™ÊúàÔºàËøûÁª≠ÂåÖÊúàÔºâÔºå3‰∏™Êúà(ËøûÁª≠ÂåÖÂ≠£) 2„ÄÅËÆ¢ÈòÖ‰ª∑Ê†ºÔºö‰ª•IAPÁî≥ËØ∑‰ø°ÊÅØ‰∏∫ÂáÜÔºå‰æãÂ¶ÇËøûÁª≠ÂåÖÊúà‰ª∑Ê†º‰∏∫È¶ñÊúà15ÂÖÉÔºåÊ¨°Êúà15ÂÖÉ/ÊúàËá™Âä®Áª≠Ë¥π entry.title: Guitar Gravitas: Chords Scales
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Lesson PackÔºö$5.99 ‚Üí $4.99 [$4.99 ~ $5.99]

Application Description

Learn Guitar. Guitar Chords & Scales Libraries, Lessons, Backing Tracks, Tuner, Metronome and much more. Guitar Gravitas is an inspirational tool for guitar players of all levels (beginner to pro) that offers the most comprehensive, advanced and interactive chord, arpeggio and scale library in the App Store. ‚Ä¢ Over 200 chord types including not only a library of 15,000 of the most commonly used chord shapes but also MILLIONS of playable shapes generated by a state-of-the-art algorithm that allows you to select the root note of the chord and also the lowest or highest note. ‚Ä¢ Thousands of arpeggios patterns generated on selection from a list of more than 200 chord types. ‚Ä¢ Over 1000 different scales from all over the world including thousands of patterns. ‚Ä¢ 31 videos with Guitar Lessons, Backing tracks, Tutorials and Support documents on PDF format. ‚Ä¢ High Precision Guitar Tuner. ‚Ä¢ Metronome. ‚Ä¢ More than 200 predefined guitar tunings and the possibility to create your own. ‚Ä¢ Interact to listen to how chords, arpeggios and scales sound. ‚Ä¢ :. Guitar Gravitas .: also comes with chord, arpeggio and scale finders where you can select notes on the fretboard and find out what what you are playing is called. ‚Ä¢ No matter what chord, arpeggio or scale you are checking out, :. Guitar Gravitas .: allows you to know what chords, arpeggios or scales you could combine it with. Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Application Screenshot

iPad

Learn Guitar. Guitar Chords & Scales Libraries, Lessons, Backing Tracks, Tuner, Metronome and much more. Guitar Gravitas is an inspirational tool for guitar players of all levels (beginner to pro) that offers the most comprehensive, advanced and interactive chord, arpeggio and scale library in the App Store. ‚Ä¢ Over 200 chord types including not only a library of 15,000 of the most commonly used chord shapes but also MILLIONS of playable shapes generated by a state-of-the-art algorithm that allows you to select the root note of the chord and also the lowest or highest note. ‚Ä¢ Thousands of arpeggios patterns generated on selection from a list of more than 200 chord types. ‚Ä¢ Over 1000 different scales from all over the world including thousands of patterns. ‚Ä¢ 31 videos with Guitar Lessons, Backing tracks, Tutorials and Support documents on PDF format. ‚Ä¢ High Precision Guitar Tuner. ‚Ä¢ Metronome. ‚Ä¢ More than 200 predefined guitar tunings and the possibility to create your own. ‚Ä¢ Interact to listen to how chords, arpeggios and scales sound. ‚Ä¢ :. entry.title: djay - DJ App & AI Mixer
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Full Access to PROÔºö$29.99 ‚Üí $6.99 [$6.99 ~ $29.99]

Application Description

*** Apple Design Award Winner 2024 *** Welcome to djay! The #1 DJ app and winner of multiple Apple Design Awards now integrates with Apple Music - mix over 100 million songs instantly! djay transforms your iOS device into a full-featured DJ system. Seamlessly integrated with your music library, djay allows you to mix your favorite songs and playlists. You can perform live, remix tracks, or enable Automix mode to let djay create a seamless mix for you automatically. Whether you are a professional DJ or a beginner who just loves to play with music, djay offers you the most intuitive yet powerful DJ experience on an iOS device. APPLE MUSIC INTEGRATION ‚Ä¢ Access to over 100 million songs ‚Ä¢ Match: recommendations based on the currently playing song ‚Ä¢ Your library: all your music seamlessly integrated ‚Ä¢ Listen Now and Charts integration ‚Ä¢ Discover new music and add songs to your Apple Music library right from within djay ‚Ä¢ Powerful search capabilities for the vast catalog of Apple Music ADVANCED MEDIA LIBRARY ‚Ä¢ Apple Music: 100+ million tracks, your personal library in the cloud (Apple Music subscription) ‚Ä¢ TIDAL: Millions of tracks, high quality sound (TIDAL DJ Extension) ‚Ä¢ SoundCloud: Millions of underground and premium tracks (SoundCloud Go+) ‚Ä¢ Beatport: Millions of electronic music tracks (Beatport Advanced Subscriptions) ‚Ä¢ Beatsource: Millions of open-format music tracks (Beatsource Subscription) ‚Ä¢ Files: access files in the cloud (e.g. Dropbox), on your iOS device, or on external hard drives seamlessly ‚Ä¢ My Collection: Powerful playlists management AUTOMIX ‚Ä¢ Automatic, beat-matched mixes ‚Ä¢ Queue and Playlist automation NEURAL MIX‚Ñ¢ ‚Ä¢ Isolate vocals, drums, and instrumentals in real-time (not supported with Apple Music) MUSIC PRODUCTION TOOLS ‚Ä¢ Sequencer: create beats on top of your music live ‚Ä¢ Looper: remix your music with up to 48 loops per track ‚Ä¢ Beat-matched sequencing of drums and samples ‚Ä¢ Extensive content library with hundreds of loops and samples. HARDWARE INTEGRATION ‚Ä¢ Plug-and-play integration with over 100 MIDI controllers by Pioneer DJ, Reloop, Hercules, Numark, Denon DJ, and more ‚Ä¢ Digital Vinyl System (DVS) Integration ‚Ä¢ Advanced MIDI Learn to map any class-compliant MIDI controller ‚Ä¢ Support for Bluetooth audio and MIDI ‚Ä¢ Support for multi-channel USB audio interfaces and video output POWERFUL AUDIO ENGINE ‚Ä¢ Ableton Link integration ‚Ä¢ Fluid Beatgrid ‚Ä¢ High-res waveforms BUILT FOR iOS ‚Ä¢ Accessible via VoiceOver ‚Ä¢ Airplay, Live Photos, Apple Watch, and iCloud integration ‚Ä¢ Haptic Feedback, Drag & Drop, Keyboard Shortcuts ‚Ä¢ Multi-Tasking: Slide Over and Split View support Top features of the optional Pro subscription include: ‚Ä¢ Unlimited access to an extensive library of samples, loops, FX, and visuals ‚Ä¢ Neural Mix‚Ñ¢ ‚Ä¢ Sampler & Looper ‚Ä¢ Automix ‚Ä¢ Crossfader FX ‚Ä¢ Video Mixing ‚Ä¢ Music Visualizers ‚Ä¢ Single Deck mode ‚Ä¢ 4-Deck mode ‚Ä¢ Advanced media library editing ‚Ä¢ Pre-cueing with headphones ‚Ä¢ Hardware integration (MIDI controllers, DVS, multi-channel audio interfaces) ‚Ä¢ 7-day free trial: free access to all djay Pro content and features for one week, cancel anytime The optional PRO subscription allows you to subscribe once and use djay Pro across all your Mac and iOS devices, including access to all PRO features, as well as 1000+ loops, samples, and visuals. A supported streaming subscription and an internet connection are required to access songs from a streaming service in djay. No recording available for streamed songs. Neural Mix cannot be used when streaming from Apple Music. Specific songs may not be available or accessible on your account or in your country. Streaming service availability and pricing may vary depending on country, currency and service.
